name: snapocr-via-paddle
title: SnapOCR Via Paddle
description: Snap a screenshot and recognize text via PaddleOCR API, optimized for Chinese handwritten and vertical layouts
author: xianwei_zhang

commands.name: quick-ocr
commands.title: Quick OCR
commands.description: Take a screenshot and copy recognized text to clipboard

commands.name: preview-ocr
commands.title: Preview OCR
commands.description: Take a screenshot and preview recognized text in a detail view

preferences.name: accessToken
preferences.title: Access Token
preferences.description: AIStudio Access Token. Get it from https://aistudio.baidu.com/paddleocr → click API → copy TOKEN value

preferences.name: apiUrl
preferences.title: API URL
preferences.description: PaddleOCR API URL (without path). Get it from https://aistudio.baidu.com/paddleocr → click API → copy the base URL from API_URL

preferences.name: useDocOrientationClassify
preferences.title: Document Orientation Classify
preferences.label: Enable document orientation classification
preferences.description: Automatically detect and correct document orientation

preferences.name: useDocUnwarping
preferences.title: Document Unwarping
preferences.label: Enable document unwarping
preferences.description: Correct perspective distortion in document images

preferences.name: useChartRecognition
preferences.title: Chart Recognition
preferences.label: Enable chart recognition
preferences.description: Recognize and extract text from charts and tables
